net.sf.j2ep.servers
Interface ServerStatusListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClusterContainer, RoundRobinCluster
public interface ServerStatusListener
extends java.util.EventListener

A listener for status messages for the servers. Classes implementing this interface can recieve information when a server goes down and when it comes back online.

Author:
Anders Nyman

Method Summary
 void serverOffline(Server server)
          Notifies that a servers has gone down
 void serverOnline(Server server)
          Notifies that a server is online.
 

Method Detail

serverOffline

void serverOffline(Server server)
Notifies that a servers has gone down

Parameters:
server - Server that is now offline

serverOnline

void serverOnline(Server server)
Notifies that a server is online. This means that the server previously has been marked as being offline.

Parameters:
server - Server that is now online
